form.p: This template is to create a Remote Service Consumer project. During project creation with this template, the apipackage/plugin containing the ExampleRemoteService class declaration must be provided so that the compile-time references to ExampleRemoteService can be resolved. The apipackage/plugin name given should already exist in thw workspace, and may be easily created by using the Remote Service API project template. Upon creation, the project will have a class with a a ExampleRemoteService interface injected via DS. Upon activation, the injected ExampleRemoteService is called.
